controls
Class MultiPurposeControl

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  controls.MultiPurposeControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MultiPurposeControl
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class a multipurpose control which has various drawing options 1) Gradient to draw the text gradient 2) Wave to draw the text using waves 3) Comic to draw the text using comic 4) FADED to draw the text using faded 5) ROSE to draw the text using rose image Also it has two other options which can be applied altogether to the above options 1) 3D text draw draws text in 3D format 2) 3D border draw 3D border around text

See Also:
Serialized Form
